ack.p: We are particularly grateful to the hundreds of respondents who took their valuable time to answer the survey questions. We also thank the Forestry Adaptation Community of Practice, the Association of British Columbia Professional Foresters, the College of Alberta Professional Foresters, the Ontario Professional Foresters Association, l’Ordre des Ingénieurs Forestiers du Québec, and the Association of Registered Professional Foresters of New Brunswick for their collaboration in the distribution of the survey. We also thank Mark Hanewinkel and two anonymous reviewers for their insightful comments on a previous version of this manuscript.
